page.title: 15EASTRIGGS HEALTH CARE
page.content: No doctor in Eastriggs. Annan & Gretna doctors attend small clinic in school annexe, 1 evening and 1 morning, weekly. At other times patients go to Annan or Gretna. Fortnightly clinics for babies and old people (chiropody). Doctor's prescriptions issued at clinic cannot be fulfilled in Eastriggs. No chemist since last one retired several years ago. Nearest chemists in Annan and Gretna. Patients needing hospital care go to Dumfries Infirmary, sometimes to the Cumberland Infirmary, Carlisle. For some kinds of treatment, they go to hospitals in Glasgow, Edinburgh or Newcastle. Mentally ill patients go to Crichton Royal Hospital, Dumfries. Most local babies are born at Cresswell Maternity Hospital, Dumfries. Nearest dentists Annan & Gretna.
